author: Stan Schroeder
title: Tesla to cut salaries, furlough staff amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Tesla has announced pay cuts and furloughs for some of its employees amid the coronavirus pandemic, which forced the company to shut down some of its factories. This is according to an email to employees, seen by Electrek, singed by Tesla's HR chief Valerie C…
content:
Tesla has announced pay cuts and furloughs for some of its employees amid the coronavirus pandemic, which forced the company to shut down some of its factories. 
This is according to an email to employees, seen by Electrek, singed by Tesla's HR chief Valerie… [+2066 chars]
